resources.string: You haven\'t set a passphrase yet!

plurals.name: ApplicationPreferencesActivity_this_will_immediately_trim_all_conversations_to_the_d_most_recent_messages
plurals.item: This will immediately trim all conversations to the most recent message.
This will immediately trim all conversations to the %d most recent messages.

resources.string: Warning, this will disable storage encryption for all messages and keys. Your encrypted sessions will continue to function, but anyone who gains physical access to your device will be able to read them.
Tap to change your default SMS app
Tap to make Silence your default SMS app
Can\'t find an app to select media.

This media has been stored in an encrypted database. Unfortunately, to view it with an external content viewer currently requires the data to be temporarily decrypted and written to storage. Are you sure that you would like to do this?
Received key exchange message, tap to process.
This message will not be encrypted because a secure session could not be established.\n\nSend unsecured message?
Can\'t find an app able to open this media.
XMPP address. Update Silence to enable this feature.
Message received from someone who also has Silence, initiate a secure encrypted session?
Are you sure you want to end this secure session?
This will permanently delete all messages in this conversation.
Sorry, there was an error adding your attachment.
The GIF you selected was too big!
Sorry, the selected video exceeds message size restrictions (%1$skB).
Sorry, the selected audio exceeds message size restrictions (%1$skB).
Recipient is not a valid SMS or email address!
The message you are trying to send is empty!
This device does not appear to support dial actions.
Secure sessions can only be established with other people.
This message cannot be sent since your carrier doesn\'t support MMS.

plurals.name: ConversationFragment_this_will_permanently_delete_all_n_selected_messages
plurals.item: This will permanently delete the selected message.
This will permanently delete all %1$d selected messages.

plurals.name: ConversationFragment_saving_n_media_to_storage_warning
plurals.item: Saving this media to storage will allow any other apps on your device to access it.\n\nContinue?
Saving all %1$d media to storage will allow any other apps on your device to access them.\n\nContinue?

plurals.name: ConversationFragment_error_while_saving_attachments_to_sd_card
plurals.item: Error while saving attachment to storage!
Error while saving attachments to storage!

plurals.name: ConversationListFragment_this_will_permanently_delete_all_n_selected_conversations
plurals.item: This will permanently delete the selected conversation.
This will permanently delete all %1$d selected conversations.

resources.string: This will send drafts of selected conversations.
Silence allows you to protect your privacy while communicating with friends.
Silence will encrypt messages with other Silence users automatically.
Silence can use unencrypted messages to chat with non-Silence users.
SMSSecure is now Silence. Your messages are still here and new features are coming.
Warning, this will export the contents of your Silence messages to storage in plaintext.
Error, unable to write to storage.
This will export your encrypted keys, settings, and messages to storage.
Exporting encrypted keys, settings, and messages...
Could not create group due to an unexpected error.
You need at least one person in your group!
This will import messages from the system\'s default SMS database to Silence. If you\'ve imported the system\'s SMS database before, importing again will result in duplicated messages.

Restoring an encrypted backup will completely replace your existing keys, preferences, and messages. You will lose any information that is in your current Silence installation but not in the backup. Silence will stop after the import.
This will import messages from a plaintext backup. If you\'ve previously imported this backup, importing again will result in duplicated messages.
Silence needs Barcode Scanner for QR codes.
Error reading wireless provider MMS settings
Received a message encrypted using an old version of Silence that is no longer supported. Please ask the sender to upgrade to the most recent version and resend the message.

The signature on this key exchange is different than what you\'ve previously received from this contact. This could either mean that someone is trying to intercept your communication, or that this contact simply re-installed Silence and now has a new identity key.
The signature on this key exchange is trusted, but you have the \'automatically complete key exchanges\' setting disabled.
You should verify the identity of this contact.
You will no longer see messages sent from this user.
Are you sure you want to unblock this contact?
Received key exchange message for invalid protocol version.
Received message with unknown identity key. Tap to process and display.
Received updated but unknown identity information. Tap to validate identity.
You do not have an identity key.
WARNING, the scanned key DOES NOT match! Please check the fingerprint text carefully.
Their key is correct. It is also necessary to verify your key with them.
WARNING, the scanned key DOES NOT match!
You\'ve already sent a session initiation request to this recipient, are you sure you\'d like to send another? This will invalidate the first request.
Request to end a non-existing session
Tap and configure MMS settings to continue download.
MMS message encrypted for non-existing session
Tap to open, or tap the lock to close.
Quick response unavailable when Silence is locked!
Could not read the log on your device. You can still use ADB to get a debug log instead.
Would you like to import your existing text messages into Silence\'s encrypted database?
The default system database will not be modified or altered in any way.
This could take a moment. Please be patient, you will be notified when the import is complete.
Export a plaintext backup compatible with \'SMS Backup & Restore\' to storage
Import the database from the default system messenger app
Restore a previously exported encrypted backup
Import a plaintext backup file. Compatible with \'SMS Backup & Restore.\'
Export an encrypted backup to storage

Silence requires MMS settings to deliver media and group messages through your wireless carrier. Your device does not make this information available, which is occasionally true for locked devices and other restrictive configurations.

To send media and group messages, tap \'OK\' and complete the requested settings. The MMS settings for your carrier can generally be located by searching for \'your carrier APN\'. You will only need to do this once.
Use Silence for viewing and storing all incoming text messages
Use Silence for viewing and storing all incoming multimedia messages
Enable this option if your keyboard supports emojis.
Choose your contact entry from the contacts list.
Enable local encryption of messages and keys
Automatically complete key exchanges for new sessions or for existing sessions with the same identity key
Block screenshots in the recents list and inside the app
Require the passphrase to access messages after a given time
The amount of time to wait before forgetting passphrase from memory
Play notification sound when viewing an active conversation.
Override system MMS settings with the information below.
Request a delivery report for each SMS message you send
Display a notification when a delivery report is received
Automatically delete older messages once a conversation exceeds a specified length
Scan through all conversations and enforce conversation length limits
Make Silence the default SMS/MMS application for your system.
Enable if your device uses SMS/MMS delivery over Wi-Fi (only enable when \'Wi-Fi Calling\' is enabled on your device).
Show sent time instead of received time for incoming messages
Tap to make Silence your default SMS app.
Tap to copy your phone\'s SMS messages into Silence\'s encrypted database.
If you enjoy using this app, please take a moment to help us by rating it.
Delivery reports allow you to know if and when your recipient had received your messages. Some mobile networks charge additional fee.
